cause.description:
A group to support the Ontario Park service, & all Ontario Parks, Provincial historic sites, Provincial historic parks,Provincial wild rivers, Provincial public lands, Provincial islands, provincial historic areas,Provincial recreation areas, Provincial preserves, Provincial lakeshores, Provincial scenic trails.
1. To conserve the scenery, and wildlife of provincial parks
2. To set aside additional land for more provincial parks
3. To educate the youth about conservation and the importance about protecting the envioroment
cause.mission: support the Ontario Parks & the history it establishes.
cause.name: Support Ontario Parks
